relatedRecords.name: jsconf.jp
relatedRecords.description: This Code of Conduct was adapted from JSConf EU’s Code of Conduct to fit Japanese culture and language. JSConf EU’s Code of Conduct was in turn based on CSSConf / JSConf AU, The Geek Feminism Wiki, the work of Valerie Aurora and Conference Code of Conduct.
